main event: An Assistant Secretary of the Army and others observed a series of strange lights over the Chesapeake Bay in Chestertown, Maryland on 24 May 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 4-5 minutes and was noted by high-level defense personnel,Investigators found that the lights had a correlation with military activities at Aberdeen Proving Grounds,The lights were described as bright and unusual by witnesses,Several local fishermen confirmed seeing the same phenomenon and attributed it to military flares,Weather conditions were clear but no radar anomalies were detected at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: strange lighted objects in the sky
